title: See How Celebs Got Ready for the Oscars
text:
A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 26, 2017 at 1:15pm PST 
"Oscars prep! ðŸ’¯twinning with @mubinarattonsey @patidubroff @lacyredway here we go " Jessica Biel A post shared by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Feb 26, 2017 at 12:29pm PST 
" #oscarsglamsquad aka my magicians @karayoshimotobua @hairbyadir " Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Jessica Biel A post shared by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Feb 26, 2017 at 11:00am PST 
"Sweating for the red carpet starts early because the need for after party pizza is REAL. #Oscars " Katie Holmes A post shared by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Feb 26, 2017 at 12:57pm PST 
"Sunday morning....face masks and pancakes ðŸ’• @kiehlsnyc " Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Naomie Harris A post shared by Naomie Harris (@naomieharris) on Feb 26, 2017 at 7:18am PST 
"Preparations for the #oscars begin early with a facial by @teresatarmey ! A moment to relax and reflect before the glamour and mayhem begins!!! " Olivia Culpo A post shared by Olivia Culpo (@oliviaculpo) on Feb 26, 2017 at 1:12pm PST 
"Getting Oscars ready right now with @sirjohnofficial and @justinemarjan !!! I want to thank @stellaartois and @marchesafashion for making me feel like a princess and giving me the ability to spread the word about the global water crisis. Everyone should go to www.buyaladyadrink.com and buy a Chalice. Each one helps @water provide 5 years of clean water to someone in the developing world. Thank you all so much again ðŸ˜˜ðŸ˜˜ #1Chalice5Years #OscarsSunday #sponsored " Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
